nodes.text: The Esus Mesa was a stone mesa located in the Jundland Chasm on the planet Tatooine that was connected to nearby cliffs by a stone bridge. In 3643 BBY, during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, the Sith Lord Praven challenged a young Jedi Knight to a lightsaber duel atop the Esus Mesa, where the Jedi defeated Praven in combat.

The Esus Mesa was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare in 2011, where it appears as a class story area for the Jedi Knight class's mission "Desert Duel."
